item.description:
Celtics are BACK in Boston for Game 5 of the Eastern Conference Semi-Finals!  COME ON DOWN to Durty Nelly's to cheer them on!  Durty Nelly's is a small, friendly little pub located in the Haymarket.  It's conveniently located near Haymarket (Green and Orange Lines), Government Center (Blue and Green Lines), and a short walk to Park Street (Red and Green Lines).  There is also parking available at nearby parking garages.

Greg, our bartender du noir, has assured me that he will put the audio on for us.  Durty Nelly's has three tvs.  Food will be available -- burgers, hot dogs, and other fried fare.

Everyone is responsible for their own food and drink. PLEASE PAY AS YOU GO OR MAINTAIN A SEPARATE TAB.  Note that while I don't expect a large crowd, Durty Nelly's may get crowded so be prepared to stand. I should be there about 6:30pm or sooner. Tip-off is at 7:00pm.  (NOTE: Lakers/Thunder play right after C's game.)

GO CELTICS!!
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture, or just ask the bartender who I am.
item.name: *LAST MINUTE MEETUP* Celtics v. 76ers Game 5 TONIGHT
